1.content: How old are you when you move to Obaasan?
1.title: Migration

choices: After arriving home, Nani decides to ask her father about the situation
In a rush of anger and frustration, Nani throws a temper tantrum
Nani secretly decides to potty train her little brother
Nani grows up as an obedient child, following her mother's wishes
11.content:
I'm Nani and I live on Obaasan. Today is my fifth birthday and I'm so excited! It's so much fun to be five! Well, except that I still have to go to school and change diapers. Diapers are so gross! But that's what I do all day. I go to school to learn about things like reading and writing and numbers; but most of our time is spent learning about how to take care of boys. For some reason, they just can't seem to take care of themselves. My mommy works during the day and my daddy stays home and helps take care of the house, but he's not very good at it. He's a lot of fun to be with: he plays with me and tucks me in for naps and we eat ice cream cones together, but that's all he can do. Mommy even comes home for lunch during the day to make him food and change his diapers; then she tucks him in on the couch, puts on our TV, and gives him a cup of milk and some books to read. He's not very good at reading though. He tries to read with me, but sometimes I have to help him with the words. I like it better when my teachers at school read to me.

It's the same thing with my little brother too. He's three. Of course, he doesn't know a whole lot of words yet, so he gets a lot more attention. I usually take care of him while mommy takes care of daddy. Both of them wander around the house in their diapers and a shirt. Sometimes when it's cold out they'll wear socks too. But usually it's just their diapers and a shirt. Of course, they do dress up when we go out somewhere, but that only happens on the weekend. But since today is my birthday, we all get to go out for dinner and we get to eat cake too!

After mommy came home from work, we all got our baths, dressed up in our going out clothes, and piled into our car to go to a restaurant that I got to choose all by myself! My favorite food to eat is spaghetti – it’s so much fun to slurp the noodles – so we went to a restaurant that serves Italian. Both my daddy and my brother ordered macaroni and cheese, and mommy ordered something fancy that I don’t know how to say. As our waiter left, I could hear the crinkle and mush of his diaper under his trousers. And from a couple of tables away, I could see another man that had wet himself and needed to be changed. That’s when I got to thinking about everything.

“Mommy?” I spoke up to get her attention.

“Yes Nani?”

“How come boys don’t use the potty and feed themselves like we do?” I asked.

“Because things just don’t work very well that way dear” she replied.

“Diapers are so messy, and sometimes they don’t get changed when they’re supposed to,” I continued.

“It’s ok sweetheart, one day you will understand why everything is so much better this way,” she smiled at me, but she also gave me that look with her eyes that said I should stop talking.

Just then, a group of people arrived with my cake lit with lots of different colored candles and began to sing…
11.title: You were born on Obaasan

12.content:
"Why don't you want to stay with us?" Your twin sister, Susan asks.

"I do want to." Aunty Kate insists. "But I can't. My job means I have to move around a lot. Your Aunty Tanya will take care of you and Daniel."

Aunty Kate, your father's sister, has been staying with you since your parents died. She won't tell you much about it but you've pieced together that something went wrong with the computer which was driving a truck and it ran into their car.

"But we don't even know Aunty Tanya." You argue.

Aunty Tanya is your mother's sister. She moved to one of the space colonies before you were born.

Your Aunty is about to respond when the doorbell rings. "That must be her." She starts toward the door but warns you both. "Behave. It was very nice of your Aunty Tanya to let you stay with her."

Soon Aunty Kate leads a woman back into the living room, behind her is a teenage girl and a boy who looks to be a just a little younger than you.

"Daniel, Susan." Aunty Kate makes the introductions "This is your Aunty Tanya and her children, Peter and Rebecca."

"Hi." you and Susan say nervously.

Aunty Tanya moves in and hugs you tightly. "Hello Daniel." then she greets Susan in the same way. "Hello Susan." She pushes her children forward. "Go on Peter and Rebecca. Say hello to your cousins."

"Hello." Rebecca says. "I'm sorry about your mom and dad."

"Hi." Peter says.

"I"ll show you where you'll be sleeping." Aunty Kate tells the guests and they follow her up the hallway to the bedrooms.

They will be staying here tonight then taking you home with them on the shuttle tomorrow.

You sit on the sofa watching the netscreen until your Aunts return. Your cousins aren't with them.
12.title: 10 (Primary school aged)

choices: Insist that you will not be wearing diapers
121.content:
''You get up and head to your room. That's where Peter will be sleeping.

You turn the door handle and push the door open to reveal a strange scene.

Peter is laying on a brightly coloured plastic mat, naked from the waist down. Next to him is a disposable diaper, wrapped in a tight ball and clearly wet. Rebecca is unfolding another large diaper.

"What are you doing?" You realise that there is only one possible answer but ask anyway.

"I'm just changing Peter's diaper." Rebecca says as though it was perfectly normal as she slides the new diaper under her brother's bottom. "He was quite wet after the drive from the spaceport."

"But...isn't he too old to be in diapers?" You ask a better question.

"Mom hasn't told you yet?" She asks as she tapes Peter into his diaper.

You star to get worried "Told me what?"

"Um." She didn't expect to have to be the one explaining this to you. "On Obaasan, our space station, boys aren't potty trained."

"What?" You demand as Rebecca helps Peter back into his jeans. "You mean they are kept in diapers?"

"Yes. That's right, all boys are kept in diapers." She says, adjusting her brother's clothes.

Thanks Rebecca." He hugs her then tells you. "You're going to wear diapers too."
121.title: Go find your cousins

choices: “Daniel Im going to start diapering you before we leave”
1211.content:
“What are you talking about, there’s no way I’m going to wear diapers” you get very defensive, confused and angry. You’re 10 years old after all you’ve been out of diapers for almost 8 years you don’t want to go back, you can‘t. You tell you cousin all this things getting very argumentative and she simply responds “You will see”.

Just as you are finishing you rant, you aunts walk in, Aunty Karty says bye to you and then leaves, after she is gone Aunty Tanya begins to say....
1211.title: Insist that you will not be wearing diapers

choices: Let it out, it’s no use
12111.content:
In the morning you wake up and you discover you are wearing a white diaper underneath your pajamas.

“NO!” You scream

“What is it Daniel?” Aunt Karty says.

“Why am I wearing a diaper?” You demand.

“On Obaasan, men have to wear them, it’s part of the culture” she replies

All of a sudden, your stomach starts to cramp up.
12111.title: Diapered

1212.content:
"What?" you repeat. "Why?"

She sits on your bed and pulls Peter onto her lap. "Sit down." She pats the spot next to her. You sit and she begins to explain. "Obaasan is a communist matriarchy. It's society is based on caring an nurturing."

"So?" you ask. "Why does that mean I have to wear diapers?"

"Boys are competitive. They naturally try to have more than everyone else. Even if that means hurting other people" she continues. "We keep them in diapers to remind them that they always need someone to take care of them."

"It's not that bad." Peter insists. "You'll like it when you get used to it."

"Isn't it embarrassing?" you ask him.

"Why? All of the other boys wear diapers too." he says.

"But your sister changes your diapers." You keep arguing. "I'd die of embarrassment if Susan changed me."

"He's not embarrassed?" Rebecca says, looking at Peter. "I take good care of you don't I?"

Peter nods and hugs his sister.

"Although I try to let mom do it when he has a messy diaper." Rebecca says, provoking giggle from Peter.

"You mess yourself too?" you ask.

"We aren't allowed to use the toilet at all." He says.

"You seem really worried about this." Rebecca says. "Maybe you'll feel better if you try it."

"Messing myself?" you ask, a little shocked.

"No, well not right away." she says. "I mean try wearing a diaper. I'll put one on you now."
1212.title: Ask Rebecca why

choices: Just tell her that it's weird
12121.content:
"Okay." you reluctantly agree. "I'll try one."

"Good." she says, sliding her brother off her lap. "You'll see it's not that bad." She tells Peter. "Go back to Mommy." then as he leaves she begins removing your shoes.

With no hesitation she unbuckles your belt and pulls your jeans down. As soon as you've stepped out of them, she pulls your underpants down too.

You gasp as you are exposed and cover your privates with your hands.

"Okay." she says, completely unaffected by your nudity. "Lay down on the changing mat."

You do as you are told and she picks up another one of Peter's diapers and unfolds it. "Lift your bottom." she directs then slides it under you. "Good boy." she praises your cooperation as you lower yourself onto the padding.

She pushes your hands out of the way as she brings the front of the diaper up between your legs and then fastens the tapes, sealing you into it. "All done." she declares, helping you up.

You move around a little, feeling the weight and the movement of your new underwear. You feel really babyish but not in an entirely bad way. You feel secure and protected.

Rebecca picks up your jeans and holds them out for you to step into. "How do you feel?" she asks as she pulls them up over your padded bottom.
12121.title: Try a diaper

choices: Tell her that you're already wearing one
Tell her you don't have any choice
121211.content:
"I feel a little silly. It's embarrassing but..." you pause. "It also kinda feels nice. Like... um.. safe. Like I'm not so tough but it doesn't matter because there's someone who'll take care of me." You look at her, blushing a little. "Does that make sense?"

"Yes." she smiles. "Boys on Earth don't get to show weakness. They are expected to be tough all of the time. Boys on Obaasan don't have that problem. It's hard to be tough when you need your mommy to change your diapers."

"I guess." you agree.

Susan lets herself into your room. "Aunty Kate is taking us all out to dinner."

"Okay." Rebecca says. "I'm almost ready."

"What's that?" Susan asks, pointing at the plastic mat on the floor.

"It's Peter's changing mat." Rebecca answers simply. "I had to change his diaper."

"Peter's still in diapers?" Susan asks. "Isn't he a bit too old?"

"All of the boys on Obaasan wear diapers." Rebecca informs her.

"Really?" Susan asks with a laugh. "Does that mean Daniel will need to wear diapers too?"

"Yes." Rebecca says.

"Are you really going to wear diapers?" she asks.
121211.title: Tell her how you feel

1212111.content:
"Um..." you say. "I'm already wearing one."

"What?" she says, not believing you. "Show me."

You glance to Rebecca, wondering what you should do.

"Go on. Show her." Rebecca says. "She'll see your diapers soon enough."

You unfasten your belt and jeans and pull them down just below your diaper.

"Wow. You're really wearing a diaper." Susan can't help letting out a giggle. "Why? You can't wait until we get there?"

"He was nervous about it." Rebecca explained. "I suggested that he should try one on and see it's not so bad."

"How does it feel?" Susan asks.

"Do you want to try and find out?" you ask, pulling your jeans back up.

"No thanks." she says. "I think I'll keep my big girl panties."

"It is embarrassing." you finally answer her question. "But also kinda comforting too."

"Does he have to use his diapers?" Susan asks Rebecca.

"Yep." comes the answer. "Boys aren't allowed to use the toilet."

"At all?" Susan asks in disbelief. "You mean they even have to mess their diapers."

"Yep." Rebecca answers.

"Ewww." Susan says with a giggle. "Will I have to change him?"

"Yes." Rebecca says. Then she admits. "But I try to let Mom do it when Peter has a poopy diaper."

Susan giggles at this.

"Is everybody ready?" Aunty Kate calls from the living room.

"Yes." Susan calls back. "We're coming."

"Wait." you say. "I can't go out wearing a diaper."

"Why not?" Rebecca asks. "Peter is wearing one."

"Yeah." Susan says. "Don't worry. We'll take care of you."

So, still diapered under your jeans, you head out of the house with Susan, Rebecca, Peter and your Aunties. Rebecca carries Peter's diaper bag in case either of you needs a change.

Before you even arrive at the restaurant you realize that you might be needing the diaper bag before the end of the night because you are already feeling the need to pee.
1212111.title: Tell her that you're already wearing one

12121111.content:
You realize that you will have to be wearing diapers full time soon, and you had better get used to it. Hesitatingly, you start to wet your diaper.

Rebecca turns to look at you (she is in the backseat of the car with you and Peter) and whispers, "I know you are using your diaper." "I'll change you when we get to the restaurant if you want."

You turn bright red with embarrassment, but you do not say anything.

Soon you arrive at the restaurant. You order a cheeseburger and fries and so does Peter. Everyone else orders a hamburger and a shake.

While you wait for your order, Rebecca says, "I need to go to the bathroom." She stands up and leaves. You remain seated for another minute, but then you realize that this is the prime time to get your diaper changed.

You say, "Can I go to the bathroom?"

Your aunty Kate, not knowing you are wearing a diaper, says, "Yeah. Go ahead." You get up out of your seat and make your way to the bathrooms. When Rebecca exits, you ask her, "Can you change my diaper?"

"Yeah." She replies. "You are lucky I always carry a fresh diaper with me for Peter, just in case." She opens the door to the family bathroom and leads you in. She makes you lie down on the floor

She starts humming as the removes the wet diaper. You cover your privates with your hands, but you realize that this is futile.

Rebecca removes the diaper from her back pocket and tells you to lift your legs. You do so, and she slides the clean diaper under you and straps it on. She then helps you put on your pants.

You want to thank her, but no words come out. She tosses the diaper in the trash and washes her hands.

By the time you get back to the table, the food has arrived. You dig in, and when you are back in the car heading home your lunch is being pushed out of you. You feel like you have to go, but you know that there are no more diapers for you to change into. You attempt to hold it, but you just do not have the strength. Even then, you have to keep it as quiet as possible to avoid detection. When the car pulls into the driveway, you jump out and head up to your room. When Rebecca walks past you, she stops and sniffs the air. Then, she opens the back of your diaper.

“Phew!”, Rebecca says and lets the diaper elastic snap back shut. She hoists you up on her shoulder like a baby, and carries you into “her room”. She then makes you lie down on the bed, while she gets the diaper bag.

When she comes back, she says to you, “I would rather not be doing this, but I know that nobody else knows about you wearing diapers, so I have to do it.” She slides off you pants and makes quick work of the messy diaper.

After she slides your pants back on, she says to you, “Once you get to Obaasan, Aunt Tanya will change you most of the time, and not me.” “Now get to bed, because we have a long day tomorrow!”

She opens the door and lets you out. You...
12121111.title: Use your diaper now

choices: "Oh, it is only one more hour"
"It's going to be nine more hours before we land"
121211111.content:
You slowly get ready for bed as you think about what life will be like on Obaasan. After you get out your sleeping bag and set it up downstairs, you lay awake for a long time, thinking. Finally, you fall asleep.

The next morning, you wake up early and climb out of your sleeping bag. You instinctively head to the bathroom, but then realize that you are wearing a diaper. You take off the diaper and use the toilet for the last time. Then, you strap it back on and head out of the room. You head to the kitchen and find Sarah and Rebecca chatting.

Sarah says to you, “Hey Daniel.” “Do you need you diaper changed?”

You turn bright red with embarrassment, but manage to say, “No”

“Really?” Rebecca says surprised “Peter is usually soaked in the morning...”

“I used the bathroom instead.” You say, and Rebecca nods.

The two girls resume their conversation about the colony. You get out cereal and milk and begin to eat. Peter comes in a little later, and begins to cook bacon. After Peter is finished with cooking the bacon, he leaves. You finish eating and go to your room to get changed. You find Peter getting into a large pink baby onesie. You are still a little surprised, even after what happened yesterday.

“Hey” says Peter, and you look over at him “Can you help me zip this up?”

You walk over to Peter and zip up the tiny zipper on the outside of the onesie. Then, you get dressed in your normal clothes. You both leave the room and head into the kitchen. Aunt Tanya is in the kitchen waiting for you.

“We have to leave now.” Aunt Tanya says, and gets the car keys off the hook. You head out the front door, and get in the minivan waiting outside.

Aunt Tanya starts the car, and you, having nothing really to do, begin talking to Peter.

“What’s it like for you to have to wear diaper all over again?” You say

“Oh, I’ve been wearing them for so long, I just got used to it.” Peter replies “There are even some good things about being diapered.”

“Really?” You say, surprised.

“Yeah.”,He whispers to you “Don’t tell anyone else this, but Rebecca and I have diaper messing contests when our mom isn’t around.” “They are fun!”

You raise your eyebrows, but you keep silent.

Then, you pull into the “airport” and you get out of the car and walk inside. Within half an hour, you are on the space plane ready to take you to the colony. You sit in one row with Sarah and Peter, while Rebecca sits across the isle with aunt Tanya.

Soon, the plane takes off. You are fascinated by the views of space through the window. You then open a book you brought and begin to read. Then, you starts to wonder how long the flight is. You lean over the aisle and ask Rebecca, “How long is this flight?” What does she say?
121211111.title: Go right to bed

choices: Offer to change peter (or something else)
1212111112.content:
Nine more hours:

“Nine more HOURS?” you think to yourself. “Wow, this is going to be a long flight.” You continue reading your book, and once you are finished with it, you realize you have to go to the bathroom. You eventually decide to go to the bathroom because you can, and not cause trouble with anybody about diapers.

When you arrive at the bathroom, you see that the bathroom is locked and three people are already waiting to get in before you. At first, you have no trouble holding your functions in, but by the time the third person enters the bathroom you are practically dancing around and letting loose in your diaper.

Finally, when the third person leaves the bathroom, you rush in, and rip off the diaper. You sit down on the toilet and just make it. You relieve yourself completely, and then stick the diaper tabs back where they should be.

You make your way back to your seat and get out your laptop (the one used by both of you) and start to
work. Then, an instant message pops up on your screen. It says, “From Rebecca31: Hi Daniel!”

You look across the isle and see that Rebecca is grinning over at you and holding a large tablet computer.

Another message pop up on the screen: “Is it OK if we talk this way as not to disturb anyone else?””

You nod your head at her and she begins to type again.

“How do you feel about moving to Oabassan?”

“I don’t really mind, except for the diaper rule.”

“*giggle*”

“Seriously!”

“Yeah, I know. I’m going to probably be the one who has to change you!”

“Really?” “I thought that Sarah was going to change me...”

“Well, Sarah doesn’t really want to change diapers in the first place, and then there is the fact that I have been changing diapers for years and years...”

“Well, I trust you and Aunt Tanya to change me now, but unless I teach Sarah, I am not going to trust her.”

“Ok then...I guess I can change all your diapers, but you really owe me! :D”

You close down the messaging program and glance over at her. She gives you a face that plainly says “You are so in debt to me”, but you know that she is only kidding. She is like that.

You open a game of Minecraft (Disclaimer: I do not own any part of Minecraft nor did I create it) and start to play. The time flies and you are only pulled back into reality when the smell of a dirty diaper hits you. You look over and see that Peter is straining in pain. Suddenly, a giant wet fart erupts from his diaper, and he looks around sheepishly. Luckily, only Rebecca and Sarah notice, and they both really do not care. Rebecca whispers to Peter across the isle, “I can’t change you until we land. It would just be too hard.” Surprisingly, Peter does not seem to mind the dirty diaper, but you do mind. What do you do?
1212111112.title: Nine more hours!

choices: Stay downstairs and follow Aunt Tanya
12121111121.content:
The smell of Peter is getting too overwhelming. You stand up and say to Aunt Tanya, “Peter’s diaper smells really bad. Do you think I could have the supplies to change him?” Aunt Tanya replies with a quick, “If his diaper is that bad, then I will change him.” She stands up, steps out into the isle, and says something to Peter. He stands up and follows Aunt Tanya to the bathrooms, You sit quietly and look out the window and wait for them to return. Finally, when they do, you notice a large bulge in Peter’s pants.

“Did you go in your diaper AGAIN?”, you ask.

“Oh, no.” He says blushing. “Aunt Tanya just double-diapered me.”

“What does that mean?”

“Oh, she just put a cloth diaper over the disposable one and added some extra padding to make sure I do not leak.”

You smile, and then but the intercom crackles to life.

“We will be arriving at Obassan in five minutes. Please fasten your lap belts for landing.”

You are relieved as the flight touches down at the jetport and you leave the plane.

The jetport is fairly large. You stretch your legs as you follow Aunt Tanya to the baggage claim area. You get your luggage, but before you are allowed to leave the airport, a security official stops you.

He looks at you and Peter and says, “Can all male members of this party please show me their diapers?” You reluctantly pull down your pants a little, to show the official your diaper, and then you pull them back up again. He then checks Peter’s diaper, and lets you pass. You head to the parking lots and get on a bus to go to the house. The bus trip is uneventful, and you arrive in front of a large white house just off the main road. Aunt Tanya opens the door and you...
12121111121.title: Get Peter changed

choices: Agree to live by the rules on Obaasan
Say that you want to stay on Earth
13.content:
"I have good news." your mother announces to you and your sisters at dinner. "One of the colonies finally accepted my application. We're leaving Earth."

"That's great Mom." your older sister, Stephanie says. "Which one?"

"It's called Obaasan." your mother informs her. "They need chemists like me for their asteroid mining operations."

"Does that mean we don't have to go to school anymore." Rebecca, your younger sister asks innocently.

"I'm afraid not." your mother dissapoints her. "They have very good schools on Obaasan. But I'm sure you'll like them more than your classes here."

That evening, When you're about to get into bed, your mother comes into your room. "Daniel." your mother seems to have trouble thinking of what to say. "I need to discuss something about Obassan with you."

"What is it Mom?" you ask, a little concerned by her tone and the apparent need for privacy.

"The rules in the colony are a little different to Earth." she says. "For boys."

You look at her, confused. "What do you mean."

"Boys have to wear diapers." she manages to say, then braces herself for your reaction.

"What?" you ask.

"Boys on Obaasan are never potty trained." she explains. "They want a society build around nurturing and sharing and believe that keeping boys diapered reminds them of the importance of those things."

"But why just boys?" you ask. "That's not fair."

"Girls are naturally nurturing. Boys tend to be more competitive." she says. "And that's not a bad thing but it does lead to problems when left unchecked. They want to avoid those problems on Obaasan."
13.title: 15 (High school aged)

choices: Tell them both to shut up
131.content:
"I know this is important to you." you say to her.

"It's important to all of us." she says. "Moving to one of the colonies means a better standard of living and a better education and future for you and your sisters."

"Okay." you reluctantly decide. "I'll do it."

"Thank you Daniel." she hugs you. "I know this is difficult to accept but I think you'll get used to it."

"Yeah." you try to sound optimistic. "It's not like the other boys can tease me about it because they'll all be in diapers too."

It's not long before your sisters find out about the strange rules on Obaasan.

"Guess what I heard." Rebecca says at dinner a few days later. "On Obaasan Daniel has to be a baby."

You turn red and look to your mother for help.

"He's not going to be a baby. He will just be wearing diapers." your mother says. "And you girls are going to have to help take care of him."

"What?" Stephanie asks. "You mean change his diapers? Ewww."

Rebecca bursts out laughing at this idea.
131.title: Agree to live by the rules on Obaasan

choices: Say that you'll wait until you get there
Wear a diaper on the shuttle
1311.content:
The teasing is too much. You get up from the table and run to your room, slamming the door and throwing yourself on the bed.

A minute later there is a knock on your bedroom door. "Daniel. Can I come in." Stephanie asks.

When you don't respond she lets herself in. Shutting the door behind her, she sits on the bed and places her hand gently on your back.

"I'm sorry Daniel." she says trying to comfort you. "I didn't mean to upset you. It's just a little strange, having to change my 15 year-old brother's diapers."

"You think it's easier for me?" you ask. "I have to wear them."

"I know." she says. "And I know you're doing this for all off us. I promise I'll look after you. I don't really think it will be that bad changing your diapers."

"Thanks." you say, sitting up next to her. "But what about Rebecca? She'll never stop teasing me."

"I said I'd look after you." she repeats. "I'll deal with her if she does anything to you."

A few weeks later the big day arrives.

"Wake up Daniel." Your mother opens the curtains. "It's time to get ready. We need to be at the spaceport in a few hours."

"Okay Mom." you say. "I'm getting up."

She remains in your room. "Technically you don't have to be diapered until we get to Obaasan." she explains. "But I don't know whether there will be anywhere private to change when we arrive so it might be a good idea for you to wear a diaper on the shuttle."
1311.title: Run to your room

13111.content:
You thought about your options for a while. You wanted to be in your normal underwear when you left the planet.

"I will wait until we get there," you said.

Your mom said that was fine, and everyone got into the family car. Your mom drove to the launch site.

After parking you went in to where you would take off from. You got your seats.

Before you knew it, you had taken off. Your flight was just a few hours. Then you landed at your new homeland.

A flight attendant helped you and your family out of your seats. Then she told your mom you need to be diapered right when you get off the shuttle.

Your mom said, "Lets get you changed. She took you to....
13111.title: Say that you'll wait until you get there

13112.content:
"I guess I could wear a diaper on the shuttle." you say. "It will give me a chance to get used to it."

"Okay." your mother says. "Go have a shower and I'll get you diapered."

You stay under the shower for much longer than you would normally, avoiding what is coming next. You are going to be put back in diapers and most likely never wear normal underpants again.

Eventually you have to turn off the water and get out. You return to your room, wrapped in a towel an find your mother waiting for you. On your bed is a package of adult diapers. "These are usually for old people who have trouble getting to the toilet." your mother explains, opening the package and removing one of the white plastic diapers. "On Obaasan they'll have ones designed for boys your age." She seems to just be talking to fill the awkward silence.

"What do I need to do?" you ask nervously.

"Oh.. um." she unfolds the large diaper. "I guess you lay on your bed."

Still wrapped in your towel, you lay down.

"I think the towel might be in the way." she says.

"Oh." you unwrap the towel, leaving you naked in front of your mother for the first time in years.

"Okay." she says, apparently finding her confidence. "Lift up your bottom so I can slide this under you." You guess she's had a lot of experience changing diapers and it comes back to her quickly.

She slides the diaper under you and you lower yourself down onto the padding. "Good boy." She says instinctively as she brings the front part of the diaper up between your legs, finally covering your privates. Holding it firmly against your stomach, she brings each of the sides up to meet is and fastens them tightly with their tapes.

She helps you up from the bed and, probably still working from long-dormant instinct, begins helping you into your clothes.

Your jeans are tight over the thick padding and the diaper's waistband sticks out more than an inch above your belt. Thankfully, your t-shirt covers that. Although, if you lift your arms or bend over it would be visible.

131121.content:
You decide that it's better to just get it out in the open, rather than worry about your sisters finding out. "I'm already wearing a diaper." you admit, blushing a little as you say it.

Rebecca just starts laughing but Stephanie asks "Really? Why? I thought you didn't need to be diapered until we got to the space station."

"Maybe he wants to be a baby." Rebecca teases between giggles. "Are you wet? Do you need me to change your diaper?"

"Rebecca!" your mother says. "Stop teasing your brother." Then she explains to Stephanie. "I thought it might be a good idea because there might not be somewhere private to change when we arrive."

"Have you packed a bottle and pacifier for him too?" Rebecca continues.

"I've had enough of this Rebecca. This is difficult enough for Daniel." your mother tells her. "Now you can wear diapers on the shuttle too."

"What?" Rebecca asks, shocked, "No!"

"Don't argue." your mother says, leading the way. "Quick come to your room or I'll change you out here."

She gives you a look, which says that you'll pay for this when Mom isn't around to protect you, but follows your mother to her room.

When she returns behind your mother she is much more quiet. You can't confirm if she is diapered under her skirt but you don't doubt it.

After breakfast, you all get into a taxi. Most of your possessions are already in a container waiting at the spaceport but you take a bag each for the flight. Your mother's is mostly stocked with diapers and changing supplies for you, and now Rebecca.

As you near the space port you see space planes lifting off and heading for orbit. You begin to get a little excited. You've never been to space before.

Your mother pays the driver and you all head into the large building.

As your mother looks around for the right queue to join Stephanie says. "I've gotta use the toilet. I'll meet you back here."

"I've gotta go too." Rebecca says. "Wait up."

"You're not going anywhere." your mother says. "You're in diapers until we get to Obaasan. That means that the toilet is off limits."

"You want me to wet myself?" she asks.

"Yes. That's what diapers are for." your mother says simply. "Don't worry, your sister or I will change you before we get on the space plane.

You wonder if you should pee before lift-off too. If there's nowhere to change on the shuttle you might be stuck in a wet diaper for hours.

"Thanks Stephanie." you say as she helps you back into your jeans.

She leads you through the chaotic mass of people to where your mother is waiting with Rebecca. It's obviously that she is still fighting the inevitability of a wet diaper.

The opportunity of a change before takeoff has passed anyway. It's time to board the space plane. There aren't many people in the queue. There are a handful of women and one man who all appear to be travelling alone and two other families. One is a boy, about your age, with his mother and father. The other Is a girl, also approximately your age, her mother and little brother, who appears to be about 5 years old.

You follow the group down a long thin corridor and enter the space plane through its air-lock doors. Everyone finds a seat and straps themselves in.

"Sit next to me." Stephanie tells you, taking your hand to indicate that she insists.

You follow her and take the window seat. She straps you in, double checking your belt before taking her own seat. Since changing your diaper she seems to really feel that it is her responsibility to take care of you.

Across the aisle, Rebecca is still fidgeting uncomfortably. You are glad that you've already wet and now have a comfortable dry diaper for the trip.

Although the plane does not take of vertically, like the old rockets, it does accelerate quite quickly and you are pushed hard back into your cushioned chair. Stephanie holds your hand, just in case you're scared. You do find it comforting.

The space plane eventually stops accelerating as it reaches orbit. Rebecca is no longer fidgeting but has turned a deep red. You guess that the pressure from the takeoff finally made her lose control and wet her diaper.

After a few minutes you can see the shuttle through your window. Its body is broad and round and has no windows. Eight large ionic propulsion drives are equally spaced around its circumference. This is the craft which will take you out of earth-orbit and to the space station.

Your space plane docks with the shuttle and everyone releases their belts and floats up out of their seats.

"Now be careful." Stephanie tells you, unclipping herself then helping you out of your own belt.

Staying close to your big sister, you pull yourself along the rail which runs along the ceiling of the cabin to the air-lock which now connects this craft to the shuttle. In front of you, Rebecca is having trouble with her skirt. Without gravity holding it down, it keeps floating up, revealing the bulge of her diaper under her leggings. Your mother takes a seat, and insists that Rebecca sit next to her. Stephanie leads you to the other seat next to your mother and clips you in before taking the last seat in the group fer herself.

Once everyone is seated, the pilot's voice comes through hidden speakers. "Please make sure your seatbelts are fastened. We will begin acceleration in a few moments. Please remain in your seats until we have stabilised at one G, simulating normal earth gravity."

As promised, you feel the craft begin to accelerate. You feel gravity return and you are once more pushed back hard into your chair. After a few minutes the force deceases and it begins to feel like normal.

"We have stabilised acceleration at one G" the pilot's voice returns. "You are now free to move about the cabin."

131121112111222.content:
Obaasan, sucks.

One of the only three planets in the far off Kelian system, and the only one in the Goldilocks zone, it's almost the same as Earth, save the different land masses, less people, and once again, how much it sucks.

You moved into a house that was identical to everyone else on your street, one of the side-effects of running a communist matriarchy is everyone being on the same status. The school is nice, and every day a bus drives you too and from it amidst all the other students in your grade, which, by the way, you are one of the only males. It seems all other teenage boys were able to get out of it, or have moved off, regardless, the school is predominately female. A school so disproportionately female might be heaven for most teenage guys, but not this school. Men are effectively classroom babies, the only interaction you get with most girls is them, seriously or otherwise, asking if you need your diaper changed. The bathrooms in the school, and everywhere else, say 'Female' and 'changing room.' Rebecca was able to ditch diapers once your made planet fall, but you're stuck for the foreseeable future. All you know these days, is your new dream is to get as far away from the god-forsaken rock known as Obaasan as possible. So yeah, Obaasan sucks.

Outside of your own life, things are different for everyone else too. Your mother is busy, in one of Obaasan's orbital stations most of the time, and your sister has really become your primary changer, at least Stephanie's still being mature. Rebecca seems to have forgotten all lessons she might have learned on the trip over, as she is back to a constant teasing of you. Tanya has become your neighbor, and one of your few friends on Obaasan, she's been nice to you, but the two of you never talk about diapers to each other.

The government itself too, The Matriarchy, as it's called, you have quickly learned is run by five directors, all of whom have their identities masked, to prevent power grabs using public support. They watch everything, all your books and communication devices, are owned by the Matriarchy, they seem to know everything that happens on Obaasan.

Today, is pretty normal for you, after a day of being socially ostracized by your mostly female peers, you've gone home for a change for Stephanie, and are now off to doing one of the few things you can enjoy, exploring the nearby woods in silence, but today...

For as long as you've been aware that boys and girls are different you've felt that you would much rather have been a girl.

Fairly early, you learned the hard way that boys are not meant to want to be girls. Your parents laughed at you when you were four and you told them you wanted a pretty dress for your birthday and you were teased by everyone in your class on your first day of school when you asked one of the girls if you could play dolls with her.

Since then you've kept your feelings to yourself. You've bought a few cute dresses and other items like bras and panties. You've worn them when you had a few hours to yourself but you've but that's not really enough.

You know that now is the time to tell your mother your secret.

"Mom there is something I wanted to tell you long ago but I never knew how. Please let me finish what I have to say to before you response." you reply.

"Mom I always wanted to be a girl, but I learned early that boys are not meant to want to be girls." you say while going over to your wardrobe and pulling out your secret slash of cloths.

Then you undress and then you put your favorite outfit consisting of one pair of pink panties, a pink bra, and one pair of red high heels on and start to walk skilled through your room.

"You see Mom I have done this whenever I had a few hours to myself in the last months. This is all I can do to match my outside with my inside.

"Here on Earth I have to hide my true personality but that is something I can somehow deal with. But on Obaasan I would be kept in diapers just because they believe that all boys are to competitive for their society if are not kept in diapers. That is not fair I am probably even more nurturing than my sisters because I have learned the hard way how much living in a competitive society can hurt."

"Living on Obaasan will probably feel like a enormous punishment for me just because I was born with the body of a boy and the soul of a girl and that would clearly be too hard to handle for me. I would even prefer to stay here on Earth in a youth center if needed because that would at least be something I could handle somehow." you almost beg.

How will your mother response?

14.content:
As you have first-thing every morning this week, you turn on your netscreen and check your inbox for replies to your college applications. A few new ones have arrived overnight and, just like all the others, they are rejections.

You try to convince yourself not to give up hope. Your grades are good. One of the colleges will accept you. However, you know the reality. There are always many times more applicants than places and you've already been rejected for most of them. There's only a hand-full of applications unaccounted for.

You are about to turn off the netscreen when another message arrives. This one is different. The subject line simply reads "Congratulations." it's from The University of Obasaan. Opening the message, you confirm that you, Daniel Robinson, have been accepted. You vaguely remember applying to the University of Obasaan amongst the dozens of applications you sent out. You remember that it's on one of the space colonies. The possibility of living in space excites you. Sure you've been to the moon, everyone has, but that's just a day trip. This is different."

The remaining replies trickle in over the next few days. They are all rejections so there is no decision to make. You're going to Obasaan. As soon as the last rejection arrives, you follow the instructions in the acceptance letter and enroll at the University of Obasaan.

When the confirmation of your enrollment arrives it contains a link to information about life on Obasaan.

141.content:
Eager to know more about the college and life in a space colony, you follow the link.

"Obasaan is a Communist Matriarchy." it explains. "Communist societies of the past have failed because they have been run by men. Sharing does not come easily to men, especially those given power. For communism to work, the authority must rest in the hands of the women." This is not what you were expecting at all.

"This is not to say that men do not play an important role." it continues. "Their competetive instinct, when properly directed, is beneficial to society. However, it may also drive them to try to sieze control. To prevent this, measures are Taken on Obasaan to ensure that men always recognise their dependence on women." You're pretty sure you're not going to like whatever these measures are.

You read on to find out. "Boys are never potty trained. They are kept in diapers and dependent on women to change them." You reread that part at least 3 times, certain that you must be reading it wrong. "The women generally keep their men in infantile clothes, or sometimes little more than their diapers. However It is not uncommon for males to be dressed in girls' clothes, often to match their mother and sisters or, later, their wife and daughters."

You tell yourself that surely this can't apply to you but that hope is squashed as you read the next paragraph. "As a guest on Obasaan, you must abide by our traditions. Males must be diapered and are forbidden from using the toilet or changing themselves. When you arrive you will be assigned to a female student who will care for you."

It ends with the statement. "To help you get through customs quickly, we recommend that you wear a diaper for your arrival on Obasaan. You will not be allowed to leave the docking bay until it is confirmed that you are diapered. Also there will be no male toilets available once you board the colony."

Diapers? Can you really go through with this? You ponder this for a few days but ultimately decide that it's your only choice. You have the opportunity to receive a college education which will set you up for life.

You wonder what it will be like to go back to diapers. Maybe you could get some and try it now.

1412.content:
You don't want to dwell on the fact that you'll soon be wearing diapers full time and do your best to put it out of your mind. You do such a good job that you completely forget about it until you are finishing packing for the trip.

Looking at your watch, you still have a little over an hour before the taxi arrives to take you to the spaceport. You race out to the nearest pharmacy.

"Can I help you?" an overly friendly young woman notices you looking around the store.

"Um. Yes." you aren't quite sure how to say this. "Errm. I'm looking for diapers."

"They are just over here." She replies with a smile. "This way." She leads yo to a shelf full of diapers for infants and toddlers, along with other supplies like powder and baby-wipes. "How old is your child?"

"Um." you blush. "I meant adult diapers."

"Oh. I'm sorry." she says, politely taking the blame for the misunderstanding. "Just over here." she directs you to another shelf, this time lined with incontinence products. "What level of protection no you need?"

"I..um." you stutter, not having the presence of mind to deny that you're the one who'll be wearing the diapers. "What do you mean?"

"Well these are designed to be very discrete." she picks up a package and shows it to you. The picture on the front shows a white pair of underpants with padding that runs from front to back between the legs. "They go on like normal underwear but they can only handle little accidents."

"Oh." you aren't sure what to say.

"On the other hand." she puts back the package and moves to the other end of the shelf where she pick up another one. "There's these." She shows you the picture, it looks much more like the baby diapers on the other shelf. "These can handle a heavy wetting and even a messy accident. But they are thicker and you can't pull them up and down."

You pay for your purchases and take them home. Double-checking your watch, you see that you've still got about 20 minutes. You carry the package of adult diapers to your bedroom and tear it open.

You pull one of the diapers out and unfold it. Just as the saleswoman said, it looks just like a baby's diaper, but huge. You lay it open on the bed and reluctantly begin yo remove your pants.

You sigh and discard the wasted diaper before pulling out a new one. This time you lay right back and make sure that you fold the front tight against your crotch as you fasten the tapes. It's still awkward but you find that you do a much better job this time.

Soon, the taxi arrives and you are on the way to the spaceport. Once inside you right queue to check in. You wait nervously, worried that the other passengers might be able to tell that you're diapered. It doesn't help that a little behind you is an extremely attractive woman.

1412222.content:
You lean to the right over the shoulder of the woman in front of you to look ahead. The line goes on for about another thirty or so people, mostly women. Almost entirely women! You find yourself a little surprised by this by this, but you hear a soft plastic crinkle come from your crotch area. Well, maybe it really isnt surprising after all.

Looking ahead you see that the line ends at a small kiosk, a woman in a blue uniform sits at a desk with three other uniformed women standing about 10 feet behind her. The woman in the kiosk is dividing her attention between the woman in front of her and a small net screen to her left. The woman in front hands over her passport which is quickly looked over and cross checked on the net screen before being handed back. The woman moves forward and the line lurches a few steps before stopping again.

"Hello, you wouldn't happen to be new here would you?"

The voice is becoming from behind you. You turn around to face the woman. You recognize her as the one you saw on the spaceplane. She had long jet black hair, complementing her fair skin and emerald green eyes. Shes about your height and has an average build and seems to be in her early 30s.

"Uhm uh, yes. I am here for school." You reply, holding out your right hand for a shake. "My names Daniel, by the way."

The woman looks down at your hand then into your eyes. She let's out a small chuckle before grabbing your hand with hers. Her grip is light and she shakes playfully, similar to what you might give a young child.

"Well then, welcome to Obasaan Daniel!" She says with an inviting smile. She disengages her hand shake. "I could tell you were new." She points her finger downward in the direction of your crotch.

"Most men here don't wear belts, or jeans for that matter."

"Why? Is it illegal?"

"Haha! Oh no it's not like that." She sighs. "Oh, why are new boys always like this? Always too cute. Say, Daniel, you wouldn't happen to be a Daniel Robinson? Attending the university as a freshman?"

"Yes, I am. Howd you know?"

"Perfect. I'm Marianne Gasky, I head the Beureu of Male Immigration and Integration for both the Directory and the University. I was told to expect you when I returned. I'm supposed to help boys like you settle into life on Obasaan."

"Oh I'm not immigrating I'm just here for school."

She raises one eyebrow. "You sure? I can tell you're already diapered, I assumed that meant you were happy to be here."

Embarrassed by her saying that, you are taken aback. You quickly regain your posture and lean in to whisper.

"Is it really that obvious?!"

She chuckles and leans towards you whispering, "Oh yes. Very much so! It bulges so much in the back that you might as well be wearing a basketball for underwear."

This only worsens your embarrassment, which is now obvious from your flushed cheeks. Marianne takes notice, and goes in for the kill. Leaning even closer.

"I dont think you could have chosen a bigger brand. Buts that okay, you'll need it."

Again you are embarrassed beyond belief. Having to wear diapers is one thing but now you are being degraded by this woman you only now just met! You have regrets coming here and you decide to leave as soon as you can get another flight. But your emotions give way to logic, and you remember all those hundreds of applications that got rejected. Obasaan is seemingly the only place thatll accept you, and if you want to get a degree for anything, it appears as though you'll have to stick it out in this odd colony.

"I'll give it a week I guess, then I'll leave if it's bad." You say to yourself turning around. You cant see it, but you can feel the proud smile emanating from Marianne behind you. You dont think you're going to like her, but if she is the head of that Beureu or department or whatever, you'll have to deal with her.

"Just give it one week. Maybe I'll get accepted elsewhere."

The woman in front of you walks up to the kiosk. You're next and take your passport out of your pocket.

The cover of the passport has the official seal of Obasaan on it in a golden ink. The seal itself is very ornate. A circle surrounded on both sides by two roses connected together by a vine that encompasses the circle. The circle itself is divided into a center and an outer ring. Within the outer ring is some golden lettering. One word on top and three on the bottom. OBASAAN is printed on the top in bold letters with the phrase 'Cooperante. Gratia vobis. Misericordia.' printed on the bottom section. You dont know latin but it sounds fancy enough. Inside the circle are the symbols for male and female. The female symbol dominates and is much larger than the male symbol. With the female symbol about as large as your thumb, and the male symbol about three quarters the length of your thumbnail. They seem to enjoy making their themes very obvious here.

The woman in front moves from the kiosk and the female attendee inside beckons you forward. You walk up and place your passport and Interplanetary ID. The woman takes them and looks both over before directed her focus to the netscreen.

"Name and business please."

"Daniel Robinson and I am here to study at Obasaan University."

"Please turn around."

"O-okay." An odd request you think, but you comply anyway. Suddenly you feel a hand pat your bottom. You should have known that's what she wanted, but it still shocked you. You take a glance back at the waiting line. Marianne is standing arms akimbo and mouths an obvious 'Good job!' Before giving a thumbs up. The rest of the women in line are unperturbed. You turn back around.

"Well look at you. First day on Obasaan and hes already padded up. Your mommy must be so proud!"

"Uh, thanks."

"Has the university already assigned you a female caretaker for your stay? If not one of our attendants can....."

"No need. I'm his caretaker."

A second, female hand puts another passport onto the kiosk. Its Marianne. She looks at you and winks before hardly slapping your bottom. An audible smack can be heard from her hand hitting the seat of your pants and smacking against the diaper. Why must she do this to you? You havent done anything wrong other than pick a strange college to attend.

"I'm Marianne Gasky, I am the head director at the BMII. Returning from a vacation on Earth. Have his luggage shipped to my apartment and I'll sort it from there."

"Oh welcome back Director Gasky! I hope you enjoyed your vacation and were glad to have you back."

The woman hands Marianne back passport and ID. Then picks up your passport and ID, and then hands it to Marianne.

"Hey thats... "

She shushes you and holds her hand.

"Dont worry I'll take good care of it. Now follow me I'll take you to my car and drop you off at your dorm."

142.content:
You book your ticket and begin making preparations for the trip.

Soon enough the big day arrives. You finish final packing and take a taxi to the spaceport. You can see the spaceplanes lifting off and heading for orbit as you get closer. You begin to get a little excited. It's really happening.

Once inside it's a bit of a challenge to find the right queue but you manage to check in with plenty of time to spare. Soon enough, you find yourself in another queue, this one much shorter, waiting to board the spaceplane. It strikes you as odd that most of the other passengers are women.

You follow the group down a long thin corridor and enter the space plane through its air-lock doors. Everyone finds a seat and straps themselves in. You hear the engine begin to warm up and then the spaceplace begins to move. Although the plane does not take of vertically, like the old rockets, it does accelerate quite quickly and you are pushed hard back into your cushioned chair.

Eventually you stop accelerating as the spaceplane reaches orbit. After a few minutes you can see the shuttle through your window. Its body is broad and round and has no windows. Eight large ionic propulsion drives are equally spaced around its circumference. This is the craft which will take you out of earth-orbit and to the space station.

Your space plane docks with the shuttle and everyone releases their belts and floats up out of their seats. On board the other craft you find the seats arranged in groups of 4, facing each other around a central table. Except for a round wall in the centre the entire space is open.
142.title: Just book your ticket

1421.content:
You choose an unoccupied group of seats and make yourself comfortable. Once everyone is seated, the pilot's voice comes through hidden speakers. "Please make sure your seatbelts are fastened. We will begin acceleration in a few moments. Please remain in your seats until we have stabilised at one G, simulating normal earth gravity."

As promised, you feel the craft begin to accelerate. You feel gravity return and you are once more pushed back hard into your chair. After a few minutes the force deceases and it begins to feel like normal.

"We have stabilised acceleration at one G" the pilot's voice returns. "You are now free to move about the cabin."

You spend the flight reading the books you brought with you.

"We are approaching the halfway point." The pilot's voice returns a couple of hours later. "Please return to your seats and fasten your seat belts. In a few moments we will be turning off the main engines and inverting the shuttle to begin the deceleration phase."

You watch everyone move back to their seats as you put your books away securely.

15.content:
Life has been a little rough the past couple years. You have been stuck in a dead end job, slaving away for little pay and no thanks. Even worse, rumors of some major cut backs have been going around the break room.

"Hey Dave, have you heard anything more about the possible cut-backs?" asks Tyler, one of your good friends.
"Nah, though I expect the axe to fall any day. I really can't believe how bad things have gotten here. Too many people competing for jobs, and not enough to go around," you reply.
"I know what you mean my friend, I ....". Tyler is interrupted as the manager walks into the break room looking clearly upset. In his hands he holds several envelopes. He hands one to each of you. "I'm sorry guys. Here is your last paycheck, please gather up your things and exit the building. I really am sorry." Judging by the stack of envelopes in his hand, nearly everyone here is out of a job.

You look over at Tyler, his head is hanging low and his chest gives a small heave like a toddler trying to stifle a sob. "Now what are we going to do?" you say aloud to no one in particular.

Tyler seems to collect himself and says, "Well I guess my wife and I will be heading to Obasaan. She got a job offer there and we had agreed that we would stay as long as I had a job, but now... what about you? Any back up plans?"

"No," you admit. There is nothing left for you here. Your parents recently passed away, leaving you nothing, you just barely managed to pay for their expenses without winding up in debt.

"Why not come to Obasaan too, I bet you could find a job, as far away as it is not that many people move there."

Though you haven't heard much about Obasaan, other than the typical male fantasies about a colony of beautiful women, like angels, that dote on men all day long. "Might as well, I got nothing going on here, when are you guys leaving?"

"Next week, I will be booking the flight once I get home. I suppose I better go break the news to my wife. Give me a call later."

You and your friend part ways and head home. Once you get home you try to decide whether to begin looking for a job, or just book the flight.

You sit down at your computer and pull up the spaceports site. Looking through the options you see there is only one flight headed out to Obaasan next week. You book your flight and start looking for housing. Amazingly, the cost of living seems to be incredibly low. "That's right;" you reply.
"Vacation?"
"No, I am hoping to find a job out there."
"Alright, if you are moving there, I will need your signature on some of these papers." She hands you a rather large stack of paper and directs you to some chairs. "Just bring them back up here when you are done, but please do not take too long, it will take me a while to make sure they are all in order."
"Sure, no problem." You sit down and begin reading the documents. You begin reading through the documents and signing them. You are only about halfway through when the attendant at the counter calls out to you. You quickly sign the remaining papers and hand them to her.

"It will be just one minute sir." Once she looks over all the paper, she places a red bracelet, like the ones used at bars around your wrist and allows you to board the plain.

Once you board, you see Tyler and his wife further back in the plain. Do you go and sit with Tyler and his wife, or do you go to your assigned seat?

When you got to them....
1522.title: Sit with Tyler and his wife.

15221.content:
As you sit down next to tyler you notice something odd VERY odd tyler is wearing a pink onesie and there is a very clear diaper buldge

"Tyler what the hell are you wearing?!" you exclaim

"its my uniform, can you believe I found a job on Obaasan before we even got there?" Tyler replied

"What the hell kind of job makes you dress like a baby?!" to frantically reply

"all males wear diapers on Obaasan, and as well they should you entire gender is basically a bunch of big babies" Interjected Bonnie, Tyler's wife

Bonnie was a fairly well known extreme feminist and a professor of women's studies and she had always "worn the pants" in their relationship. When she heard about Obaasan she thought it sounded like heaven, but Tyler had a solid job on earth. The moment she heard he lost his job she booked passage to Obaasan immediately.

"well im going use the bathroom, something this little guy doesent need to worry about ever again" bonnie continued

she then kissed Tyler on the forehead and went to find the girls room

"is what she is saying true?" you inquire

"well yeah Obaasan is a Communist Matriarchy, women basically rule everything and guy are never potty trained and required to wear diapers, dude did you seriously do zero research on a place you plan to move to?" said tyler

"dude we have been friends our whole lives... did you ever know me to be the type to do my homework?" you retort

"Ha I guess you are right" Tyler said with a grin

"ive got to find a way out of this mess I dont want to wear diapers for the rest of my life!" you say fearfully

"its to late man... we have taken off and you already signed the immigration papers" said Tyler in a matter of fact tone

"shit! the papers I dident even read them" is your panicked response

at this time Bonnie having just returned from the restroom and hearing the tail end of your conversion smugly said

"see you really do need a woman to take care of you, in fact the customs officials are in no way going to be happy with you if you show up their with out a diaper on, they might fine you or worse"

"really?" you ask

"yes really, you see thanks to me Ty Ty here is all prepared, I got him a job testing experimental new diapers and other products for a major company" said bonnie

you look at Tyler and ask

"did you really accept a job testing diapers WHY?

"well" Tyler said "I have to wear them anyway and the salary was well over double what I was making on earth, plus Bonnie got a job as one of the researchers at the company so it all worked out.

"What exactly is "experimental" about the diaper you are wearing" you ask curiously

"all they told me is this is a new diaper that is designed to help men from outside of Obaasan transition to diapers more easily, they said thats all they could tell me, all I know is every since Bonnie put it one me ive felt pretty happy and and peace with the idea of my new life in Obassan" replied Tyler

"this is all insane" you say, completely overwhelmed by all this information

"is it?" Bonnie replied "the latest study showed that over 98% of males were much happier on Obaasan, and I think you will be too Dave, you can just admit that you need a woman to take care of you and being the caring woman I am i think ill help you out. I have a few more of Ty Ty's diapers in my bag, If you like ill put one on you and then you wont get in trouble when we land, all I ask is that you admit I was right and you really do need a woman to take care of you, by the way im sure you will find one on Obaasan it over 80% women, most of them looking for a cute little guy to care for"

You are somewhat perplexed on the one hand it seems you have no choice but to accept that you will be diapered eventually but at the same time you have no desire to give up just yet.....

info.brief_description: You find yourself in a society where males are never potty trained and are kept in diapers
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

It is the not too distant future. Technological progress has made it possible for average people to travel to space and live there. Overpopulation has made it necessary.

A number of colonies have been set up, on space stations and other planets and moons. Some are owned by governments, others by private corporations.

A very small minority are owned by those who live there, groups of idealists who put their funds together to leave earth and create their idea of the perfect society. Obaasan is one of those colonies.

The founders of Obaasan described it as a Communist Matriarchy. They believed that communist societies of the past have failed because they were run by men. Men are instinctively competitive and are easily corrupted by power. Women on the other hand are nurturing and sharing, therefore a communist society can only succeed as a matriarchy.

Naturally, given the nature of men they would eventually try to take over and ruin everything. Therefore, to keep men in their place, they are never potty trained. They are kept in diapers and dependent on women to care for them their entire lives.

The women generally keep their men in infantile clothes, or sometimes little more than their diapers. However It is not uncommon for males to be dressed in girls' clothes, often to match their mother and sisters or, later, their wife and daughters.
